comments.author: REO Weedswagon

comments.text:
+REO Weedswagon  Well, there are two basic ways to DM when it comes to D&D. 
The first way, which most people play, are when the DM rolls during combat 
and saving throws. The second, that they are playing, is where you use the 
dice for just about everything. The popular way lets the DM decide whether 
or not a players idea works; while the second way lets the dice decide 
their fate.
comments.author: Natalyn Groke

top_comment.text:
So - here's a question for the communities.

Is this video funny?

I do not mean objectively funny I mean funny from the perspective of an RPG player who loves their hobby and would like to not have to endure the dismissive looks of co-workers when talking about their hobby.

I watched this (well most of it) and immediately I was cringing. In my eyes this video propagates so many stereotypes that it's painful. The extremely nerdy guys who have absolutely no self awareness. The fact that they "hail" their club. The fact that they have a "club". The hot girl that easily manipulates the guys. The hot girl is only there to take advantage of these poor pitiable nerdy guys. It's just rife with offensive characterizations to me.

To me this is a very poor representation of our hobby. I understand this is satire, I understand it is not meant to be representative of our hobby but a charicature based upon stereotypes. The problem in my eyes is that most people out there won't see this as a caricature but more as representative.

A few months ago my Mother-In-Law saw an episode of BBT that showed them playing an RPG. She asked me about my games and asked "Is that what your games are like?" (Note my MIL is a wonderful person and very intelligent). Having not seen the episode, I could only tell her probably not. I went looking for the episode and was glad I gave that answer.

It's gotten easier over the years as RPGs become more mainstream. Will Wheaton does an amazing job of promoting our hobby in a light that isn't disdainful and stereotypical.

This seems to feed off and propagate that stereotype. It makes me sad.

Am I the only one?

THE RUNES ON THE DOOR TO THE DRAGON'S LAIR

SIX MONTHS OF QUESTING I CAN'T BELIEVE

WE'RE FINALLY HERE.
MY CHARACTER SHEDS TEARS OF JOY.

AH CRITICAL FAIL.
INSTEAD OF CRYING YOU BREAK A LEG.

THAT'S UNFORTUNATE.
[BREATHING] LUKE, I AM YOUR RING TONE.

OH THAT'S ME GUYS, LET ME TAKE IT.
HEY YEAH!

HI!
OH, JUST HANGING OUT WITH THE GUYS DOING

PLAYING DUNGEONS AND DRAGONS.

OH, COME ON!
YEAH, YOU CAN COME OVER IF YOU WANT.

YEAH, OKAY, HELLO, BYE.

ONE CANNOT SIMPLY JOIN THE GUILD OF ADVENTURERS.

YOU CAN'T INVITE A GIRL.
MY CHARACTER LEFT HIS FORMAL ROBES BACK IN

TOWN FIVE MOVES AGO.
HE'S A TOTAL DISASTER.

WHAT DO I HAVE TO ROLL TO GET HIM A FACIAL?
UH, CRITICAL FAIL.

DANG IT.
BESIDES, NO FACIAL IS GOING TO HELP DAMIAN

THE STOUT?
HE IS A VERY ATTRACTIVE GNOME.

WELL ACCORDING TO THE GUILD OF ADVENTURERS-
HUZZAH MAGIC POWERS.
--CHARTER THERE ARE NO RULES AGAINST HAVING A GIRL

COME BECAUSE WE NEVER FIGURED THEY'D ACTUALLY
WANT TO BE HERE, SO...

I GUESS WE'LL HAVE TO LET HER PLAY.
YEAH, I GUESS SO.

UH, ADAM ARE YOU DOWN HERE?
YEAH, COME ON DOWN.

GUYS THIS IS CARLY.
MILADY.

UH, I STAND WITH SKILL IN STANDING AND BEQUEATH
TO THEE

MOST ZEALOUS GREETINGS.
SHE IS SO HOT.

I KNOW.
THANK YOU.

SO CARLY, DO WE NEED TO MAKE
YOU A CHARACTER?

I THINK I HAVE ONE BASIC SHEETS WITH THE-
OH, NO NEED I'LL JUST PLAY MY CHARACTER

AVENGLEN ARADO.
SHE'S A LEVEL 15 ELVEN RANGER STEWARD OF

THE FOREST
AND SILENT HUNTRESS. [GASP]

SO WHERE ARE WE?
OH THE GUILD OF ADVENTURERS- HUZZAH MAGIC POWERS.
-WAS JUST ABOUT TO OPEN THE DOOR TO THE

GOLDEN DRAGON'S LAIR.
OKAY, AND I TRUST WE HAVE THE PROPER MAGICAL

AMULETS
TO PROTECT US FROM THE DRAGON'S CYANIC ABILITIES?

I LOVE HER.
UH-HUH YES.

WE HAD BEEN MEANING TO GET THOSE.
HAVE WE?

OH, WE HAD.
I ACTUALLY HAVE THREE.

UM, LET'S SEE.
AVENGLEN PUTS ON THE AMULET AND THE PURPLE

STONE IS FRAMED BY HER RAVEN HAIR 
AND FLAWLESS ALABASTER SKIN.
SO INTO THE CAVERN THEN?

OH YES, THE DRAGON APPEARS TO BE SLEEPING.
OH, SWEET WE DON'T EVEN HAVE TO FIGHT IT.

WE CAN JUST TAKE THE TREASURE AND RUN.
HUZZAH.

SO YOU WOULD JUST ROB THE DRAGON BLIND?
JASON, FOR SHAME!

BUT TO BE FAIR MILADY DRAGONS ARE RATHER EVIL
CREATURES, KIND OF LIKE THE IRS BUT WITH WINGS.

REALLY?
WHAT DO YOU KNOW OF THIS DRAGON?

WELL IT'S A DRAGON.
ATE MY MOTHER ONCE.

SO YOU FIGURED YOU KNOW EVERYTHING ABOUT IT
JUST BECAUSE OF

THE WAY IT LOOKED AND THE COLOR OF ITS SKIN.
IS THAT RIGHT?
WE'RE DRAGON RACISTS.

YEAH.

THAT'S FINE.
AVENGLEN APPROVES WHOLE-HEARTEDLY AND SHE

SMILES AT YOUR SWEETNESS.

NO THE MOST THAT ROLL WILL GET YOU IS A CONFUSED LOOK.
